Mehmet is a professor in the Department of Psychology at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology in the city of Trondheim in Norway. He additionally holds a Professor II position at the Inland Norway University of Applied Sciences.

Mehmet has a fairly varied academic background, on the basis of which I have been awarded professorships in the following fields:
<ul>
  <li>Psychology (2020)</li> 
  <li>Marketing (2019)</li> 
  <li>Quantitative Research Methods (2012)</li> 
  <li>Tourism (2007)</li> 
</ul>
 

My academic and research interests centre on:

<ul>
  <li>Programming R and Stata Statistical Packages</li> 
  <li>Structural Equation Modelling</li> 
  <li>Human Mate Choice Behaviour</li> 
  <li>Consumer and Tourist Behaviour</li> 
</ul>
